title: Understanding Human Behaviour
headline: This free online psychology and sociology course explores the many complex motivations behind human behaviour.
description: Humans are complex beings and we function and interact with our environment and each other in the form of our behaviour. How each individual behaves is a manifestation of various social and psychological factors. Sociologists and psychologists have always studied human behaviour with great interest. Now it's your turn. This course helps you learn and understand the latest psychological principles and factors behind human behaviour.
courseDescription:
Human behaviour is a complex but fascinating subject. It presents a myriad of reflections on social, psychological, genetic and educational factors. It has generated interest from social scientists and psychologists alike. It has been the subject of many deep-rooted studies and research to understand how each human behaves in a unique way. This course, 'Understanding Human Behaviour', is a perfect opportunity to help you understand this concept with all its complex demands and factors. It will help you develop a logical understanding of human behaviour through the various social, psychological and other related elements.

We have organised the course into two different modules, each divided into topics related to human behaviour and various associated factors. It is a step-by-step guide to understanding human behaviours and some of their key influencers. Gain a deep insight into the psychological process behind human behaviours, various evolution theories and human intelligence with its different approaches and elements and variations affecting intelligence tests. You will learn about other critical behavioural aspects like learning, conditioning, communication and language. By the end of this course, you will be more familiar with the science behind human behaviour.

The world is changing quickly and so are workplace and personal life roles. As a result, there is an increasing demand for people who have the skills to understand human behaviour and act accordingly. This course will help you understand and become familiar with the psychology behind your own and other individuals' behaviour. It helps you better manage and improve your social and interpersonal skills and find success and acceptance in your personal and professional life. So whether you are a student, a professional or somebody just interested in understanding the dynamics of how humans behave, this course is perfect for you. It raises your skills and knowledge of human behaviour and makes you confidently move ahead in your personal, social and professional life. So join the course now and be ready for some fascinating discoveries behind the science of human behaviour.
